title: Child rapist who got girl, 11, pregnant moans he 'won’t be able to go shopping in jail'
text:

A sick child rapist complained he wouldn't be able to go shopping in prison after he was jailed for 24-years for raping an 11-year-old girl.

Robert Cronin was arrested and charged in January after claiming his young victim got pregnant after wearing a sock he used while performing a solo sex act.

The 33-year-old pervert has been slammed for his arrogance after he was sentenced on Thursday.

The court heard from his traumatised young victim, who has since given birth to his baby, who said Cronin has destroyed her life forever.

Cronin, a computer worker, of Niskayuna in upstate New York, US, was exposed when a call was made to a child abuse hotline in November last year, nine months after the rape.

(Image: Google)

According to Metro , Prosecutor Michael Nobles blasted Cronin, saying: "An 11-year-old girl gave birth to a child because of his selfishness and he’s mad he can’t go to malls."

Cronin was also given a further sentence of up to three years for lying in court, which will run concurrently.

The girl and her baby are safe and are being cared for, social services confirmed.
description: The young victim said Cronin, from Niskayuna in upstate New York, has destroyed her life forever
